); }; const mapStateToProps = (state) => { //store.getState() return { buyerBids: state.buyerBids, user: state.user, }; }; const mapDispatchToProps = (dispatch) => { return { loadBuyerBids: (id) => dispatch(loadBuyerBidAction(id)), }; }; export default connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(BuyerHome);
